thread.section_title: The Goring - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: This really deserves a five star rating.
thread.title_full: This really deserves a five star rating. - Review of The Goring, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: bzmd53
title: This really deserves a five star rating.
text: Really lovely place, not only the rooms, but the staff, the tea room, the bar, the restaurant....everything is right and luxurious here. I couldn't recommend it more highly. We intended to move on to other places, but this hotel was so wonderful, we decided to stay put and use this as our base of operations. The concierge staff was amazing, I don't know how I've travelled without them!
